name: Mindy's Undersea Spree
description:
Objective:

Help Mindy the Mermaid collect as many coins as possible while avoiding Sweet tooth the Shark.

That's it, that's the game.  This is my first game I've released(technically my second), but this is my first hand drawn video game I released.

Controls:

If using Keypad:

Up = W

Down = S

If you are using a controller:

Up and Down on the D-Pad.

Score System:

Here is the score system when you collect coins:

Red = 1

Blue = 3

Green = 5

Gold = 7

Shark = Game Over

This is my first game(took me a week to make)and I know its crap. But hey, it is my first and I loved working on this. I hope with this experience I will make far more exciting games in the months ahead. This is just the beginning. XP

Credits: Music and Sound by freeSFX
